name: Rise
description: Rise is a first-person platformer combining casual gameplay mechanics with demanding challenges.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 512 MB or more DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 700 MB available space
